entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High 8 except minus 3 over eastern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 8 except minus 3 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
